text:
TelnetAppender is broken and cannot work. No output is ever received on the 
other end. 

class variable "active" is never set to true in TelnetAppender.java, resulting 
in error message from log4j when trying to log message using TelnetAppender: 
0 [main] ERROR org.apache.log4j.net.TelnetAppender - Attempted to log with 
inactive appender named [telnetAppender].

Bug applies to versions 1.3alpha-8 and 1.2.14
creator: omichels@web.de

text:
Created attachment 19337
Testcase for TelnetAppender and possible fix
creator: omichels@web.de

text:

correct Testcase, first was incomplete
creator: omichels@web.de

text:
wrong usage of TelnetAppender in my Testcase. 

TelnetAppender gets activated and works correctly, 
if configuration is done via log4j.properties.

Regards, Oliver Michels
creator: omichels@web.de
